title: Ticket #6720: Keep peers in sync after SSL authentication failures
description:
Some failures during SSL authentication in CEDAR leave the peers out-of-sync, preventing them from trying other authentication methods. Instead, the peer with the error can send a status message indicating it's aborting the SSL authentication process.

Also, failures during initialization can cause the BIO buffers to be leaked.
